title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, November 9, 2020
description: It's the anniversary of Kristallnacht (1938), which erupted after German Nazi Joseph Goebbels made a speech implicitly endorsing anti-Semitic violence.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the anniversary of Kristallnacht (1938), which erupted after German Nazi Joseph Goebbels made a speech implicitly endorsing anti-Semitic violence.
